name: Avoidance (Husky 10)
description:
This game I made in 20 minutes. It might look unpolished, but I like the final product.

Use the arrow keys to move and avoid enemies and collect coins.

Please subscribe to my youtube channel at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh_t0DIFZks4_6uwiRFIX2w

Or check out my portfolio at: www.husky-10.com
